// dfog.h : header file
//

// Dfog dialog

class Dfog : public CDialog
{
public:
   int applied;

   CMyglView *m_pView;

// Construction
public:
        Dfog(CWnd* pParent = NULL,CMyglView *pView=NULL);   // standard constructor

// Dialog Data
        //{{AFX_DATA(Dfog)
        enum { IDD = IDD_FOG };
        CString m_type;
        float   m_density;
        float   m_end;
        float   m_start;
        BOOL    m_use_background;
        BOOL    m_enable;
        CString m_color;
        BOOL    m_quality;
        //}}AFX_DATA


// Overrides
        // ClassWizard generated virtual function overrides
        //{{AFX_VIRTUAL(Dfog)
        protected:
        virtual void DoDataExchange(CDataExchange* pDX);    // DDX/DDV support
        //}}AFX_VIRTUAL

// Implementation
protected:

        // Generated message map functions
        //{{AFX_MSG(Dfog)
        afx_msg void OnApply();
        afx_msg void OnEditColor();
        virtual void OnCancel();
        virtual void OnOK();
        //}}AFX_MSG
        DECLARE_MESSAGE_MAP()
};
